com.google.zxing

接口 Writer

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AztecWriter, CodaBarWriter, Code128Writer, Code39Writer, DataMatrixWriter, EAN13Writer, EAN8Writer, ITFWriter, MultiFormatWriter, OneDimensionalCodeWriter, PDF417Writer, QRCodeWriter, UPCAWriter, UPCEANWriter

    public interface Writer
    The base class for all objects which encode/generate a barcode image.
    作者:
    dswitkin@google.com (Daniel Switkin)

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      BitMatrix encode(String contents, BarcodeFormat format, int width, int height)
      Encode a barcode using the default settings.
      BitMatrix encode(String contents, BarcodeFormat format, int width, int height, Map<EncodeHintType,?> hints) 

    • 方法详细资料

      • encode

        BitMatrix encode(String contents,
               BarcodeFormat format,
               int width,
               int height)
                 throws WriterException
        Encode a barcode using the default settings.
        参数:
        contents - The contents to encode in the barcode
        format - The barcode format to generate
        width - The preferred width in pixels
        height - The preferred height in pixels
        抛出:
        WriterException

      • encode

        BitMatrix encode(String contents,
               BarcodeFormat format,
               int width,
               int height,
               Map<EncodeHintType,?> hints)
                 throws WriterException
        参数:
        contents - The contents to encode in the barcode
        format - The barcode format to generate
        width - The preferred width in pixels
        height - The preferred height in pixels
        hints - Additional parameters to supply to the encoder
        抛出:
        WriterException
